oai_dc:dc.dc:title: K-alpha X-ray satellite spectra of Ti, V, Cr and Mn induced by photons
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MURTI, MVR
RAJU, SS
REDDY, BS
RAO, VK
MOMBASWALA, LS
REDDY, TS
LAKSHMINARAYANA, S
PREMACHAND, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mg
k x-ray satellites
crystal spectrometer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: K X-ray emission spectra of Ti, V, Cr and Mn generated by photon excitation have been studied with a crystal spectrometer. The measured energy shifts of K-alpha satellite relative to the diagram line are compared with values obtained by electron excitation and with different theoretical estimates. The present experimental values of K alpha L1/K alpha L0 relative intensities are compared with values obtained by electron excitation.
